extensions.name: linear
extensions.author: thomaslombart
extensions.description: Create, search, and manage Linear issues

commands.name: create-issue-for-myself
commands.title: Create Issue for Myself
commands.description: Create and assign a new issue to yourself.

commands.name: search-issues
commands.title: Search Issues
commands.description: Search issues globally in all projects.

commands.name: assigned-issues
commands.title: My Issues
commands.description: View and modify issues that are assigned to you.

commands.name: justPlay
commands.title: Just Play
commands.description: Quickly start playing a song based on your query.

commands.name: togglePlayPause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.description: Toggle the playback of the current song.

commands.name: search
commands.title: Open Channel
commands.description: Search for workspace members, group chats, and channels.
